questions.instructions: For the following statements, please reflect on your experience playing Space Oddity (the game you played for this study) and rate your agreement accordingly.

q_text.text: I can always manage to solve difficult problems in Space Oddity if I try hard enough.
In Space Oddity, if something/someone opposes me, I can find the means and ways to get what I want.
It is easy for me to stick to my aims and accomplish my goals in Space Oddity.
I am confident that I could deal efficiently with unexpected events in Space Oddity.
Thanks to my resourcefulness, I know how to handle unforeseen situations in Space Oddity.
I can solve most problems in Space Oddity if I invest the necessary effort.
I can remain calm when facing difficulties in Space Oddity because I can rely on my coping abilities.
When I am confronted with a problem in Space Oddity, I can usually find several solutions.
If I am in trouble in Space Oddity, I can usually think of a solution.
I can usually handle whatever comes my way in Space Oddity.
